Generation I.Red: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees .
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees .
Generation I.Yellow: Walks on its hind legs. Shows signs of intelligence. Its armor-like hide even repels molten lava.
Generation I.Stadium: Protected by an armor-like hide, it can survive in lava over 3,600 degrees . Its horn can bore holes through boulders.

Generation II.Gold: Its rugged hide protects it from even the heat of lava. However, the hide also makes it insensitive.
Generation II.Silver: Its brain developed when it began walking on hind legs. Its thick hide protects it even in magma.
Generation II.Crystal: By lightly spinning its drill-like horn, it can easily shatter even a diamond in the rough.
Generation II.Stadium 2: Its rugged hide protects it from even the heat of lava. However, the hide also makes it insensitive. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) Its brain developed when it began walking on hind legs. Its thick hide protects it even in magma. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Rhydon 's horn can crush even uncut diamonds. One sweeping blow of its tail can topple a building. This Pok é mon 's hide is extremely tough. Even direct cannon hits don't leave a scratch.
Generation III.Sapphire: Rhydon has a horn that serves as a drill. It is used for destroying rocks and boulders. This Pok é mon occasionally rams into streams of magma, but the armor-like hide prevents it from feeling the heat.
Generation III.Emerald: Its horn, which rotates like a drill, destroys tall buildings with one strike. It stands on its hind legs, and its brain is well developed.
Generation III.FireRed: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit .

Generation IV.Diamond: Its brain developed after it stood up on its hind legs. Its drill horn bores tunnels through solid rock.
Generation IV.Pearl: Its brain developed after it stood up on its hind legs. Its drill horn bores tunnels through solid rock.
Generation IV.Platinum: Standing on its hind legs freed its forelegs and made it smarter. It is very forgetful, however.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Its rugged hide protects it from even the heat of lava. However, the hide also makes it insensitive.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Its brain developed when it began walking on hind legs. Its thick hide protects it even in magma.

Generation V.Black: Standing on its hind legs freed its forelegs and made it smarter. It is very forgetful, however.
Generation V.White: Standing on its hind legs freed its forelegs and made it smarter. It is very forgetful, however.
Generation V.Black 2: Standing on its hind legs freed its forelegs and made it smarter. It is very forgetful, however.
Generation V.White 2: Standing on its hind legs freed its forelegs and made it smarter. It is very forgetful, however.

Generation VI.Y: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Rhydon's horn can crush even uncut diamonds. One sweeping blow of its tail can topple a building. This Pokémon's hide is extremely tough. Even direct cannon hits don't leave a scratch.

Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: Its brain developed when it began walking on its hind legs. Its armor-like hide even repels molten lava.

Generation VIII.Sword: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
Generation VIII.Shield: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Its brain developed after it stood up on its hind legs. Its drill horn bores tunnels through solid rock.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Its brain developed after it stood up on its hind legs. Its drill horn bores tunnels through solid rock.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Rapidly rotates its horn to bore through bedrock. It swaggers around volcanic regions, protected from the lava's heat by its tough, armorlike hide.

Generation IX.Scarlet: The horn of a Rhydon is powerful enough to crush raw diamonds. These Pokémon polish their horns by bashing them together.
Generation IX.Violet: It evolved to walk using only its hind legs, which has allowed it to expand its habitat even onto steep mountains.
